'''1.1.7''' is an update for {{el|pe}}, released only for iOS on September 15, 2017, which added support for [[Wikipedia:IPv6|IPv6 IP addresses]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://itunes.apple.com/app/id479516143|title=Minecraft: Pocket Edition on the App Store}}</ref> It is the final update for Pocket Edition on iOS, as the [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.0|next version]] would merge it with [[:Category:Bedrock_Edition|its derived editions]] into [[Bedrock Edition]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Networking'''
* Added support for IPv6 IP addresses.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Marketplace]]'''
* Disabled for users in mainland China. Existing content can still be played.

== Trivia ==
* This was the final update to the game subtitled ''[[Pocket Edition]]''.
